query.statement: SELECT '000' AS CODE, '- ÀüÃ¼ -' AS CODE_NAME FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT A.MEAL AS CODE, B.CODE_NAME FROM FSA_HALL_DTL A, (SELECT CODE, CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0023') B -- ³¢´Ï WHERE A.UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND A.HALL_CD = #HALL_CD# AND A.MEAL = B.CODE ORDER BY CODE
